HINTS!
Most Windows Users must use WinJcap 4 make the socket work!
http://www.winpcap.org/install/default.htm
-----------------------------------------------------------
If this not help try also:
http://netresearch.ics.uci.edu/kfujii/jpcap/doc/download.html

This Program is old but Useful!
Edit the Protocol manual and [Reload] your changes then in the section [EDIT Protocol] in this Program!
:flegelDEV
